data.text:
Alliance | Herod | Loot Council | Semi-Hardcore

Raid Schedule

Tues/Wed 8-11:30 PM EST

Who Are We?

Buds is a semi hardcore WoW:Classic raiding guild. We’re a group of mature and skilled players who aim to clear raids efficiently while maintaining a positive and fun environment. We look forward to our adventure on Classic: World of Warcraft.

We are a PvE focused progression guild, requiring less on farm. Also expect us to PvP quite a bit.

Guild Goals

Building a raid team that has an enjoyable atmosphere, while clearing raids effectively & efficiently.

Having a tight-knit core that feels like family, a place to call home.

We aren’t rushing level 60 to avoid burn out, we plan to be in MC/Ony by week 5-6.

Expectations

Show up prepared/ontime for raids & guild v guild PvP.

Be knowledgeable about your class & always stride to improve.

Respect guild leadership decisions & guild policy.

Communicate effectively & efficiently to your role leader(s).

Currently Recruiting Note: optimal race/class combo isn’t required & we accept socials.

Warrior Fury - MEDIUM

Warrior Prot - CLOSED

Rogue - MEDIUM

Hunter - LOW

Warlock - CLOSED

Mage - LOW

Paladin - MEDIUM

Priest - MEDIUM

Priest Shadow - OPEN

Druid - CLOSED

Druid Feral - CLOSED

All exceptional players considered!
